ValidationRule.description: GTMS_10568 : Create a VR to prohibit Renewal AEs from updating an opportunity sub-type to “Auto-Renewal” if it does not satisfy the auto-renewal requirement
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'Samsara Sales - Renewals - New System'), NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption ), ISCHANGED(Sub_Type__c),Text(Sub_Type__c)=='Auto-Renewal',OR( SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.Contract_Renewable_ACV_USD__c>15000, Account.Account_Size_Segment__c ='ENT',NOT(ISBLANK(Finance_Partner__c)), Account.Quarantine_Enabled__c = TRUE, Account.Delinquent__c = TRUE, Account.Auto_renewal_Opt_Out__c = TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK(Reseller__c)),ISBLANK( Account.Billing_Stripe_Customer_Id__c ))), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more fields on this opportunity is not eligible for auto-renewal.
